works.description:
BLiNK is a design blog written by the  
employees of HDR Architecture. It's updated several times a week with new 

content, by one of fifty or so different authors. To make sure our
bloggers  
know when their posts are live on the site, we use the Feedburner email  
subscription service.

It's clear that "rD" who runs 4authenticity.blogspot.com subscribes to our
 
Feedburner and then automatically reposts the content onto his/her own  
blog. This apparently has been going on since April of this year. This is
a  
clear violation of the Terms and Conditions of BLiNK, which are posted on 

our site: http://blink.hdrinc.com/terms-use See "Terms and Conditions,"  
number 3.
